content: Hi ! I'm totaly new here ; I've been giving a try at https://github.com/rtfeldman/roc/issues/2586 , and I might have a fix (though it looks way to simple to not break anything). as per CONTRIBUTING.md, the idea would be to create an issue branch, is there a naming convention ? i/2586 ?
there is no convention. that name seems fine, if applicable we usually add some extra words to indicate what is going on
Pierre-Henri Trivier has marked this topic as resolved.
